course_title: The World of the Sagas (in English)

001.comments: An examination of primarily medieval Scandinavian contributions to world literature and culture in light of historical, social, and cultural context. We will concentrate on the Norse sagas. These stories feature elements like magic, witches, zombies, family feuds, monsters, revenge, and slapstick humour. No prior knowledge about Scandinavia or the Viking Age is required.

description: Scandinavian contributions to medieval and early modern world literature, culture and history.
